subject: Automobile Racing
organizations: National Assn of Stock Car Auto Racing
lead_paragraph: Denny Hamlin fought off a challenge from Matt Kenseth midway through the race yesterday, then drove away for a dominating victory in the Carfax 250 Nascar Busch Series race at Michigan International Speedway. Kevin Harvick, winner of the previous two Busch races, was third. Carl Edwards, who finished 28th after being hit from behind and spinning, still leads the series by 700 points over Harvick.
